Raots

Korean: 라오츠

China

Group (2022-2024):
JWiiver

Introduction

Raots is a Chinese singer under Star Weave Entertainment. As a trainee, he participated in the Chinese survival show "Next Generation Star." On February 17, 2022, Raots made his official debut as a member of the boy group JWiiver.
